title: 103_s240
content: The Act titled "National Service Implementation Act of 1993" states that the Demonstration Program Loan Forgiveness does not apply to individuals performing national community service. Section 428J of the Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to update the program authorization and demonstration program. Subsection (b) is revised, including the redesignation of subparagraphs. Subsection (g) is also modified to address multiple programs. Section 428J of the Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to update program authorization and demonstration programs. Subsection (b) is revised, including the redesignation of subparagraphs. Subsection (g) is also modified to address multiple programs by inserting and striking references to "programs". Section 428J of the Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to update program authorization and demonstration programs by inserting a provision for carrying out the demonstration program in succeeding fiscal years. The Loan Forgiveness Entitlement Program is established under Section 3. The Loan Forgiveness Entitlement Program under Section 3 of the Act is amended to include the Secretary's obligation to repay loans for borrowers who volunteer for service under specified acts or as full-time employees of tax-exempt organizations. The Loan Forgiveness Entitlement Program is amended to include loan repayment for borrowers volunteering at tax-exempt organizations under certain conditions. Borrowers meeting specific criteria are entitled to receive loan repayment as outlined in the provisions of the program. SEC. 4. NUMBER OF LOANS WHICH MAY BE FORGIVEN; LOAN REPAYMENT. The Act is amended to include a demonstration program for individuals under subsection (b)(1). The Secretary assumes the obligation to repay for individuals described in subsection (b)(2)(A). The Act includes a repayment obligation for Stafford loans based on academic year, starting at 15% for the first year and increasing by 5% each subsequent year up to 30%. Loan cancellation applies to Perkins loan borrowers who perform national service. Loan cancellation under Section 465(a)(2) of the Act applies to Perkins loan borrowers who engage in full-time volunteer service under the Peace Corps Act, Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973, or similar service with a tax-exempt organization. Compensation must not exceed the minimum wage rate specified in the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938. Loan cancellation under Section 465(a)(2) of the Act applies to Perkins loan borrowers who engage in full-time volunteer service with tax-exempt organizations. Compensation must not exceed the minimum wage rate specified in the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
